tool_description: Detects and suggests corrections for misspelled words using dictionary lookup and phonetic similarity algorithms.

text.description: The text to check for spelling errors

language.description: Language for spell checking (e.g., en-US, en-GB)

error_messages: Unsupported language: Provide a supported language code.
Invalid custom dictionary: Custom words must be non-empty strings.
Text too long: Input must be under 20,000 characters.
usage: Provide text and language, optionally add custom dictionary words. Returns misspelled words with correction suggestions.

correction_suggestions.description: Top correction suggestions for each misspelled word

total_errors.description: Total number of spelling errors found
